Altra 2021 Sustainability Report  /   SUSTAINABILITY    /  10
Sustainability has long been inherent  
in Altra’s operational processes. With 
ABS and our Core Values as our guide, 
we consistently apply rigor, discipline 
and continuous learning principles to 
drive sustainable outcomes in everything 
we do.
This includes, for example, a track record 
of identifying and eliminating waste at our 
facilities, delivering innovative solutions that 
enable our customers to identify their own 
opportunities for efficiency, fostering a work 
environment that stimulates and fully develops 
the capabilities of our people, and operating 
our business with an unwavering commitment 
to integrity. OUR SUSTAINABILITY JOURNEY
In 2021, we advanced 
several key initiatives 
that further strengthen 
our ability to mobilize 
efforts around ESG 
priorities.ESG TASK FORCE  
We established an ESG Task 
Force to work across the 
organization to understand 
existing ESG efforts, aggregate 
processes and best practices 
and identify opportunities to 
improve ESG strategies and 
implementations going forward
MATERIALITY ASSESSMENT  
We conducted a Materiality  
Assessment under the guidance 
of a third-party consultant 
to identify the ESG issues 
most material to our business 
and of greatest importance 
to our stakeholdersIn 2021, we advanced several key initiatives that further strengthen  
our ability to mobilize efforts around ESG priorities and enable Altra to  
make meaningful and sustainable impact in the years ahead.
FOUR PILLARS  
We crafted a four-pillar 
sustainability strategy that 
aligns with our Core Values  
and provides focus and clarity  
as we evolve and define our  
ESG efforts 
DIVERSITY  
We established a Diversity,  
Equity & Inclusion Committee
FUTURE REPORTING  
We evaluated reporting 
frameworks to assess which 
standards are best aligned 
with our business and our 
stakeholders’ interests for 
future reporting
